ItemBGDesc: Letter from outer space by Hosea Lazaro the comet hunter â€” full of rubbish.\n\n"Back when I was still in the space station, I would look into the night sky in search of those faraway celestial bodies. Those clouds of stars, soft and alluring, captured my anxious heart. If you are like me, it's only a matter of time before people crown you with the title 'comet hunter'."
